articles.title: Ecowas orders 'standby force' to restore constitutional order in Niger - Euronews
articles.description: West Africa leaders have directed the deployment of a ‘standby force’ to restore democracy in Niger after the coup.
articles.content:
West Africa leaders have directed the deployment of a standby force to restore democracy in Niger after the coup.
 The Ecowas bloc in West Africa has ordered the  deployment of a standby force to re… [+6805 chars]
